College of Arts and Humanities

Minor Admission Requirements
None
Minor Requirements
None
Prerequisite Courses
None

courseSection0.text0:
Complete the following: 
MUT1004 - Fundamentals of Music I (3)
MUT1121 - Music Theory and Musicianship I (4)
courseSection0.text1:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
MUL2010 - Enjoyment of Music (3)
MUL2016 - Evolution of Jazz (3)
MUL2720 - Music of the World (3)
MUH2017 - Survey of Rock Music (3)
MUH2019 - American Popular Music, 1840s-present (3)

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 9 credits from the following types of courses: 
Restricted electives must be taken from the School of Performing Arts at UCF and must include 3 hours minimum at the 3000 or 4000 level.

li.A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all: A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 9 hours used in the minor must: At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection0.text:
Other Requirements

A minimum GPA of 2.0 is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
Grades below "C" (2.0) are not accepted.
At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
